Welcome to convert2 Documentation
========================================
Convert anything to any type.

.. _install:

Install
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``convert2`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

	$ pip install convert2

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

	$ pip install --upgrade convert2
